original_text: A person who is on the roof of his house must not go down into the house. He must not stop to get anything from his home.
korean_text: 지붕 위에 있는 자는 내려가지도 말고 집에 있는 무엇을 가지러 들어가지도 말며

sentences.original_text: A person who is on the roof of his house
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 집 지붕 위에 있는 사람은

sentences.original_text: must not go down into the house
He must not stop to get anything
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 아무것도 가지러 멈추지 말아야 한다
